title: 06/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Ryan Hollins
itunes:title: 06/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Ryan Hollins
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre, in for Dan Patrick, discuss what the 76ers struggles against the Hawks means for the legacy of Doc Rivers. The guys toss around some potential Ben Simmons trades. Could Zion Williamson forego his rookie extension? 10-year NBA veteran Ryan Hollins joins the guys to talk issues with the Mavericks and the Clippers attempting to get to the Finals without Kawhi.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
